title: Madras potato curry
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '680g potatoes, cut into 1cm cubes', '250g cauliflower florets', '1 large onion, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1/2 tablespoon ground ginger', '100g red lentils', '1 (400g) tin whole tomatoes, chopped', '250ml vegetable stock', '2 tablespoons malt vinegar', '1 tablespoon mango chutney', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'chopped fresh parsley for garnish']
